channel.title: Object Help (317)

item.title: Object Help (317)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I made a minigame somewhat like barrows where you kill monsters until one drops a key, then you use the key on the chest that’s in the room with you, and it gives a random item. I’m trying to figure out how to add random items to the chest.

How do I choose what is in the box.

This is the barrows chest which I was using to try to figure this out.

sM("Congratulations, you have completed the barrows minigame!"); addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1); addItem(Item.randomRunes(), misc.random(75)); addItem(Item.randomRunes(), misc.random(75)); addItem(995, misc.random(100000));

Read full topic
